title: Lagging during games
body: Everytime I get into a game I start lagging and attempting to reconnect I have checked multiple forums and it keeps happening my internet is fine I have 80 mbs and everything else works great like internet and videos and stuff. league is the only thing lagging.

replies.body:
What you're describing are pretty common symptoms of *Packet Loss*, which usually ends up being a routing issue to our servers. Before we investigate into a potential routing problem, I'd recommend you work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

If you continue to experience these symptoms after working through the guide, let me know.
i am getting a bunch of yellow on the packet loss thing that it sent me to but none of it makes sense to me:(
That's fine, I wouldn't worry too much about that for now. Are you seeing any difference in-game after having worked through that entire guide?
LOL as funny as that was I don't think that will solve my problem. hahaha

I have to close the client after I get into game, and I've found that my FPS is better if I load the game using the Alpha client instead of the Legacy client, although the Alpha client is extremely laggy for me during team selection. Start a game and close LeagueClient.exe in Task Manager and see if that helps. I know it stinks having to log back in every game, but that's what I have to do. It may work for you as well.

Ever since the last patch I've had problems with my FPS.
